definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
not well/out of sorts/in a bad mood/without discrepancy/accurate
(of a person) valiant and formidable-looking/to carry oneself tall

sentences.english: And when finally I put it down, my mind was totally refreshed.
sentences.chinese: 最后放下书来时，我倦意全消，身心为之一爽。

sentences.english: But not heavy enough to let me fly.
sentences.chinese: 但是这边的风真的大得够爽。

sentences.english: Refreshingly enough, the myth-busting didn't always come from scientists.
sentences.chinese: 够爽吧，破解神秘并不总是靠科学家。

sentences.english: Ladies, tell your man how to get you off.
sentences.chinese: 女士们，跟你们男人讲讲如何做才能让你们爽翻天吧。

sentences.english: You know why it's a fine moring, don't you?
sentences.chinese: 你们知道为什么这么爽，对吧？

sentences.english: Uhm, I think it'd be pretty neat walking down The Masters' 3)fairways .
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我想走在举行名人赛的球道上一定特别爽。

sentences.english: Everybody loves you when they are about to cum .
sentences.chinese: 当你让其他人爽到极点的时候，每个人都会爱死你的。

sentences.english: At a stretch learned a quite a few chapter today, great.
sentences.chinese: 今天一口气学了好几章，爽。
可口可乐是令人心清气爽的饮料。

sentences.english: This attitude will not keep your woman happy.
sentences.chinese: 这种态度，你女人是不会爽的。

sentences.english: After doing these above without no error , you can run you database very smoothy .
sentences.chinese: 在做完如上步骤后，你可以非常爽的使用数据库了。

sentences.english: "It was a f---ing thrill," he says. "I never wanted to stop."
sentences.chinese: “真他妈的爽，”他说，“我从没想过要停下。”

definition: to satisfy a craving/to get a kick out of sth/gratifying/immensely enjoyable/satisfying/fulfilling
delighted/to one's heart's content/straightforward/also pr. [tong4 kuai5]
to feel great/blissful/to be in bliss
not well/out of sorts/in a bad mood/without discrepancy/accurate
lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
